CustomField.description: Formula field to provide last S75 Status field update date when "Issued" or "Missing Information" is selected. This field is used by the flow responsible for creating followup tasks and notifications.
CustomField.formula: IF( OR( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "AUSTRAC Registered"), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Cancelled"), !ISPICKVAL(Type_of_Registration__c, "New Registration") ) , null , CASE( TEXT(S75_Status__c), "Issued", S75_Issued_Date__c, "Missing Information", S75_Missing_Information_Date__c, null) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Provides date for last S75 Status field update when "Issued" or "Missing Information" is selected
CustomField.label: S75 Last Status Update
